meanings.definition: A single piece of type representing a single letter or symbol.
meanings.sent1: The printer carefully selected the logotype for the headline.
meanings.sent2: The company's logotype featured a bold, stylized letter 'A'.
meanings.sent3: The logotype decided to take a vacation from the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so unique, it became her personal logotype.
meanings.sent5: The logotype on the sign caught the attention of passersby.

meanings.definition: A symbol or other design adopted by an organization to identify its products, uniform, vehicles, etc.
meanings.sent1: The sports team proudly displayed their logotype on their jerseys.
meanings.sent2: The golden arches are a famous logotype recognized worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The logotype on the company's truck seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a logotype, instantly recognizable and welcoming.
meanings.sent5: The logotype of the tech giant was sleek and modern, reflecting their brand image.
